## HIV-Pr-receptor structure download/clean

download 1HSG PDB structure form online database, remove the bound drug from Merk and write out protin only/ligand only files 

use get.PDB() and read.PDB() and atom.select() and write.PDB()
```{r}
library(bio3d)

file.name <- get.pdb("1hsg")

hiv <- read.pdb(file.name)
hiv
```
use atom.select() to only select protein 
```{r}
prot <- atom.select(hiv, "protein", value = TRUE)

write.pdb(prot, file = "1hsg_protein.pdb" )
```
atom.select() for ligand 
```{r}
lig <- atom.select(hiv, "ligand", value = TRUE)
write.pdb(lig, file = "1hsg_ligand.pdb")
```
